thread.title: 8-year-old fatally shot in Houston after car crash - ABC News
thread.title_full: 8-year-old fatally shot in Houston after car crash - ABC News

author: Abc News
title: 8-year-old fatally shot in Houston after car crash - ABC News
text: Email An 8-year-old was fatally shot following a car crash in Houston, Texas, early Saturday morning. Three cars collided at an intersection near Sam Houston Parkway. The 8-year-old, traveling with the child's mother, survived the crash and but was subsequently shot to death, officials told ABC owned-and-operated television station KTRK. ABC News' Gina Sunseri contributed to this report. This is a breaking news story. Check back for updates. 0 Shares
